mapper.select: SELECT * FROM DCADM.DC_META_TREETABLE WHERE (C_AJLXCODE =#{ajlx} AND C_TREEID='0') OR (C_TREEID = '0' AND C_ETBNAME='YASTML_YASTML')
SELECT c_name FROM dcadm.dc_ajlxlist WHERE c_ajlx = #{ajlx}

select ms.ajbs,ms.xh,ms.xsmc,ms.wjmc,ms.wjhz, mm.mlmc,mm.mlbh from ${jalxqz}_stwj ms left join ${jalxqz}_mlxx mm on(mm.ajbs=ms.ajbs and mm.mlbh=ms.ssmlbh ) where ms.ajbs = #{ajbs} AND mm.DEPT_CODE ='510107'

select ms.ajbs,ms.xh,ms.xsmc,ms.wjmc,ms.wjhz, mm.mlmc,mm.mlbh from ${jalxqz}_stwj_gc ms left join ${jalxqz}_mlxx_gc mm on(mm.ajbs=ms.ajbs and mm.mlbh=ms.ssmlbh ) where ms.ajbs = #{ajbs} AND mm.DEPT_CODE ='510107'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, XX.* FROM (select ajbs,ajlx from sgy.buf_eaj WHERE SUBSTR(AJLX,0,1)in ('1','2','3','4','5') and SUBSTR(AJLX,2,1)in ('1','2','3','4','5') ) XX WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRownum}) WHERE RN > #{rownum}
select * from dcadm.dc_meta_treetable where c_treeid=0 order by to_number(c_nodeid)
